data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mawdsley, Jonathan R., Erwin, Terry L., Sithole, Hendrik, Mawdsley, James L., Mawdsley, Alice S. (2011): The genus Anthia Weber in the Republic of South Africa, Identification, distribution, biogeography, and behavior (Coleoptera, Carabidae). ZooKeys 143: 47-81, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.143.2075, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.143.2075
